ch0243_81_yuri/0101_0701_01_10:
Glad you could make it
today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_81_yuri/0101_0701_02_10:
If we all work together, we can overcome any
challenge life throws at us! Let’s get going!
ch0243_81_yuri/7101_0701_01_10:
Wearing this uniform reminds me of my Galar
Gym Challenge.
ch0243_81_yuri/7101_0701_02_10:
Battling with my Pokémon in a stadium filled with
loads of people...
ch0243_81_yuri/7101_0701_03_10:
I was absolutely chockablock with nerves
and excitement!
ch0243_81_yuri/7102_0701_01_10:
When I’m wearing this uniform, I’m in full
challenger mode!
ch0243_81_yuri/7102_0701_02_10: It gets me so fired up, I feel I can face anything!
ch0243_81_yuri/7103_0701_01_10: This uniform is the one for Gym Challengers...
ch0243_81_yuri/7103_0701_02_10:
But Galar Gyms each have their own
unique uniforms!
ch0243_81_yuri/7103_0701_03_10:
Some of the uniform designs are based on the
Gym’s type, for example. They’re quite popular
among fashion lovers!
ch0243_81_yuri/7104_0701_01_10:
Sonia and Nessa both took on the Gym Challenge
back in the day.
ch0243_81_yuri/7104_0701_02_10:
I guess that means they wore the same uniform
I’ve got on now...
ch0243_81_yuri/7104_0701_03_10: How do you suppose they looked in it?
ch0243_81_yuri/7105_0701_01_10:
I’ve been in a lot of nearly hopeless pinches, and
there’ve been loads of times when I really thought
things wouldn’t end well...
ch0243_81_yuri/7105_0701_02_10:
But you know what? If you don’t give up and
keep pushing until the end, it really is possible
to make a comeback!
ch0243_81_yuri/7105_0701_03_10:
So don’t ever give up on a battle, no matter how
bleak things seem,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_81_yuri/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s something to show my support for all your
hard work!
ch0243_81_yuri/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it helps you with your own challenge!
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0701_01_10:
You can get numbers printed on the back of your
Galar Gym Challenge uniform!
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0701_03_10:
You can choose any number you like, up to
three digits.
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0701_04_10:
I wonder what number you’d
choose, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0702_01_10:
You can tell a lot about a person just from the
number on their back.
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0702_02_10:
Like, for example—Leon, the unbeatable
Champion, has “1” on his back! Guess he’s saying
he’s “number one”?
ch0243_81_yuri/2501_0702_03_10:
If you come across someone from Galar, pay
attention to what number they have on their back!
ch0243_81_yuri/2511_0701_01_10: Back in Galar, I got an endorsement from Leon.
ch0243_81_yuri/2511_0701_02_10: Then I left Postwick to take on the Gym Challenge!
ch0243_81_yuri/2511_0701_03_10: I battled and camped and had so much fun!
ch0243_81_yuri/2511_0702_01_10:
Looking back on my Gym Challenge...
Winning against Hop and the others...
ch0243_81_yuri/2511_0702_02_10:
I didn’t just come out of it with a lot of great
memories—I got a lot of strength, too! I can hold
my head high and say that!
ch0243_81_yuri/3001_0701_01_10:
For my morning run, I’m gonna do five laps
around Pasio! Well...I’ll try, at least!
ch0243_81_yuri/3003_0701_01_10:
Finally, time for a lunch break! Now what shall
I eat?
ch0243_81_yuri/3005_0701_01_10:
You’re up late! I’m also gonna do more training,
so let’s work hard together!
